This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a discounted rate. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience or investment portfolio with a remarkable addition. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500.
